summary: TAKATA RECALL. MARCH 2017, I WAS NOTIFIED MY VIBE WAS PART OF A RECALL DUE TO AIR BAGS. SINCE THEN I HAD NOT HEARD ANYTHING. SEPT. 8, 2017, I CALLED PONTIAC HQ. AT 1-800-762-2737 AND WAS TOLD THE " RECALL IS INCOMPLETE, A REMEDY IS NOT YET AVAILABLE".  AFTER 6 MONTHS THIS SEEMS TO BE UNRESPONSIVE.
